title: Manager, Data Science
description:
The Manager of Data Science at NBCU will be an important leader on the NBCU Ad Impact team. This role will focus on two priorities: 1) develop scientifically rigorous methods for full funnel and cross platform measurement of media efficacy, 2) drive revenue growth by demonstrating the value of the NBCU portfolio through data science.

Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
Develop advanced statistical and data science methods for measuring the impact of advertising on our linear TV, digital and social media platforms
Build cutting-edge AI and machine learning algorithms for multi-touch attribution
Partner with cross functional teams to develop and deploy state of art full funnel and cross platform attribution solutions for a wide range of industry verticals
Support senior sales leadership to maximize yield and hit revenue goals by demonstrating the effectiveness of advertiser spend across the NBCU portfolio
Respond to client objectives with solutions that tap into NBCU’s vast resources
Mentor junior data scientists and analysts on the team
Qualifications/Requirements
Advanced degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Physics or an equivalent quantitative field
Five years of experience in data science roles at technology companies preferred
Proven expertise in experimental design, causal inference, predictive modeling, machine learning algorithms for multi-touch attribution (deep learning is a plus)
Expert level proficiency in scientific computing with R and python (tensorflow is a plus)
Strong proficiency in big data technology, including Hadoop, Hive / Pig, Spark
Hands on experience working with large datasets on distributed data platforms
Experience in building automated data pipelines using open source solutions preferred
Familiarity with modern approaches to TV and digital direct attribution in the media industry
Prior experience in the ad-tech measurement space preferred
Knowledge of mobile app tracking technology preferred
Project management experience working with third party vendor solutions a plus
Capable of working efficiently and accurately with excellent attention to detail while handling multiple projects in a fast paced, deadline driven environment
Capable of creative storytelling, data visualization and presentation
Team player with strong communication and interpersonal skills
Previous people management experience preferred
Must be willing to work in New York, NY
